title: Are Kate Hudson, Nick Jonas living together?
text: Nick Jonas Describes His Ideal Girlfriend! 00:37 Nick Jonas isn't the type to kiss and tell, so he's playing coy on those Kate Hudson romance rumors.That said, the 23-year-old singer-actor will dish on the type of lady he'd like to be his next girlfriend—and Kate sure does seem to fit the bill!
